com.amazonaws.util

Enum Base64

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public enum Base64
extends java.lang.Enum<Base64>
    A Base 64 CODEC API. See http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4648.txt
    Author:
    Hanson Char
